title: Help with font id
content:
Can anyone help out with the identification of this font...

[link](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113027/http:/superuntitled.com/filer/font.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113027/http:/typophile.com/files/font_13.png) | 6.85 KB |

 [‹ Any ideas on this?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49965 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sans Serif font for Scientific Journal: Arthritis Research and Therapy ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49960 "Go to next forum topic")
author: oliverlawrence

comments.content:
Hi Oliver,  
looks like [Vista Sans Alt](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113027/http:/www.emigre.com/fontpage.php?SVisSaMeA.html).

And, please read this, for the next time! ;-)  
 [http://typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q\_2](http://web.archive.org/web/20081005113027/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "http://typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q\_2")  
F
